aga්ramathya ranil wika්ramasinha, amathya es.bi. nawinna, akila wiraj kariyawasam, sagala rathnayaka, sarath fonseka, niyojya amathya indika bandaranayaka, shantha bandara, wayambaa palath pa්radhana amathya dharmasiri dasanayaka yana mahathwarun athu`tha mathi amathiwaru pirisak da, jathika tharuna sewa sabhawe sabhapathi nithignya erandika waliange, polispathi pujitha jayasundara yana mahathwarun saha rajya niladharin athulu pirisak mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.

ehi sandahan wanne thawaduratath ratawal yatath kara ganima awasan kara aapasu harimata thiranaya kala bawayi.yatathkara gath pradesha palanayata senapathiwarun hamudanka samaga nathara kara aleksandar aapasu harune aganuwarata aapasu giya wahama aaramayak idikarana bawa ha ehi wisimata bhikshun wahansela kihipa namak wadammagena yamata duthayan ewana bawata ihatha ki nayaka bhikshun wahanseta prathignya dimen pasuwaya.me kisiwak itu kirimata prathama, enam thama rata bala aapasu yamatada prathama atharamanga babiloniyawedi (wathman irakaya) aleksandar hadisiye miyagiyeya.
